summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy, specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records concerning victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.

events.title: Warrant Execution Deadline
events.description: The search warrant must be executed on or before this date, as commanded by the court.

events.title: Warrant Issuance
events.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman issued the search warrant for Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The warrant authorizes the search of Jeffrey Epstein's multi-story single-family residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.
The search targets evidence of violations of Title 18, U.S. Code, Sections 1591 (sex trafficking of minors) and 371 (conspiracy).
Items to be seized include computer devices, storage media, and electronically stored information such as communications, photographs of victims, and records of ownership or access.
The warrant allows for forensic imaging of devices and the use of techniques like keyword searches to locate relevant data.
The warrant was issued on July 2, 2019, and must be executed by July 12, 2019.
